CiiComponents.description: CiiComponents represents the contributing factors to a CII score.

CiiScore.description: CiiScore represents a Composite Instability Index score for a region or country.

computedAt.description: Last computation time, as Unix epoch milliseconds.. Warning: Values > 2^53 may lose precision in JavaScript

trend.description:
TrendDirection represents the directional movement of a metric over time.
 Used in markets, GDELT tension scores, and risk assessments.

ClassifyEventRequest.description: ClassifyEventRequest specifies an event to classify using AI.

ClassifyEventResponse.description: ClassifyEventResponse contains the AI-generated event classification.

Error.description: Error is returned when a handler encounters an error. It contains a simple error message that the developer can customize.

message.description: Error message (e.g., 'user not found', 'database connection failed')

EventClassification.description: EventClassification represents an AI-generated classification of a real-world event.

severity.description:
SeverityLevel represents a three-tier severity classification used across domains.
 Maps to existing TS unions: 'low' | 'medium' | 'high'.

FieldViolation.description: FieldViolation describes a single validation error for a specific field.

description.description: Human-readable description of the validation violation (e.g., 'must be a valid email address', 'required field missing')

field.description: The field path that failed validation (e.g., 'user.email' for nested fields). For header validation, this will be the header name (e.g., 'X-API-Key')

ForensicsCalibratedAnomaly.description: ForensicsCalibratedAnomaly is a conformal anomaly decision for one signal.

calibrationCenter.description: Calibration center (median) used for non-conformity scoring.

calibrationCount.description: Number of calibration samples used to compute this p-value.

intervalMs.description: Observed inter-arrival interval for this signal (milliseconds).. Warning: Values > 2^53 may lose precision in JavaScript

isAnomaly.description: Whether the event is anomalous under p_value <= alpha.

nonconformity.description: Non-conformity score for this sample (absolute deviation from center).

observedAt.description: Observation timestamp, as Unix epoch milliseconds.. Warning: Values > 2^53 may lose precision in JavaScript

severity.description:
SeverityLevel represents a three-tier severity classification used across domains.
 Maps to existing TS unions: 'low' | 'medium' | 'high'.

ForensicsFusedSignal.description: ForensicsFusedSignal is the weak-supervision fusion output for one source.

probability.description: Calibrated probability that this source is high-priority (0.0 to 1.0).

ForensicsPhaseTrace.description: ForensicsPhaseTrace is a per-phase execution trace record.

completedAt.description: Phase completion time, as Unix epoch milliseconds.. Warning: Values > 2^53 may lose precision in JavaScript

elapsedMs.description: Phase elapsed time in milliseconds.. Warning: Values > 2^53 may lose precision in JavaScript

error.description: Optional error message for failed phases.

startedAt.description: Phase start time, as Unix epoch milliseconds.. Warning: Values > 2^53 may lose precision in JavaScript

status.description: ForensicsPhaseStatus reports execution status for each orchestrator phase.

ForensicsPolicyEntry.description: ForensicsPolicyEntry stores one learned policy value (Q-table row).

lastReward.description: Last reward applied to this row.

lastUpdated.description: Last update timestamp, as Unix epoch milliseconds.. Warning: Values > 2^53 may lose precision in JavaScript

stateHash.description: Hashed state key used for policy lookup.

visitCount.description: Number of updates for this row.

ForensicsRunMetadata.description: ForensicsRunMetadata identifies one shadow pipeline run.

completedAt.description: Completion time, as Unix epoch milliseconds.. Warning: Values > 2^53 may lose precision in JavaScript

startedAt.description: Start time, as Unix epoch milliseconds.. Warning: Values > 2^53 may lose precision in JavaScript

ForensicsRunSummary.description: ForensicsRunSummary is a compact record for run history listing.

anomalyFlaggedCount.description: Number of rows flagged as anomalies.

maxFusedScore.description: Maximum fused score observed in this run (0-100).

minPValue.description: Minimum p-value observed in this run (0-1). Defaults to 1 when empty.

ForensicsSignalContributor.description: ForensicsSignalContributor describes the contribution of one signal type.

contribution.description: Contribution to the fused score (0-100 scale).

learnedWeight.description: Learned weight used for this signal.

ForensicsSignalInput.description: ForensicsSignalInput is a normalized scalar signal used by shadow forensics runs.

confidence.description: Optional confidence provided by upstream source (0.0 to 1.0).

observedAt.description: Observation timestamp, as Unix epoch milliseconds.. Warning: Values > 2^53 may lose precision in JavaScript

region.description: Optional region key (for example ISO2 country code).

ForensicsTopologyBaselineSummary.description: ForensicsTopologyBaselineSummary contains current baseline stats for one metric key.

count.description: Number of observations in this baseline.

lastUpdated.description: Last update timestamp as Unix epoch milliseconds.. Warning: Values > 2^53 may lose precision in JavaScript

ForensicsTopologyMetricPoint.description: ForensicsTopologyMetricPoint captures one historical metric value for a run.

completedAt.description: Run completion timestamp as Unix epoch milliseconds.. Warning: Values > 2^53 may lose precision in JavaScript

GdeltArticle.description: GdeltArticle represents a single article from the GDELT document API.

tone.description: GDELT tone score (negative = negative tone, positive = positive tone).

GdeltTensionPair.description: GdeltTensionPair represents a bilateral tension score between two countries from GDELT.

trend.description:
TrendDirection represents the directional movement of a metric over time.
 Used in markets, GDELT tension scores, and risk assessments.

GetCountryIntelBriefRequest.description: GetCountryIntelBriefRequest specifies which country to generate a brief for.

GetCountryIntelBriefResponse.description: GetCountryIntelBriefResponse contains an AI-generated intelligence brief for a country.

generatedAt.description: Brief generation time, as Unix epoch milliseconds.. Warning: Values > 2^53 may lose precision in JavaScript

GetForensicsPolicyRequest.description: GetForensicsPolicyRequest retrieves learned orchestration policy rows.

limit.description: Maximum rows to return (1-500). Zero uses server default.

GetForensicsPolicyResponse.description: GetForensicsPolicyResponse returns policy rows for inspection.

GetForensicsRunRequest.description: GetForensicsRunRequest fetches metadata and aggregate counts for a run.

GetForensicsRunResponse.description: GetForensicsRunResponse includes run metadata and output counts.

anomalyCount.description: Number of anomaly rows stored for the run.

fusedCount.description: Number of fused signal rows stored for the run.

GetForensicsTopologySummaryRequest.description: GetForensicsTopologySummaryRequest retrieves topology alerts, trends, and baseline stats.

alertLimit.description: Maximum topology alert rows to return (1-500). Zero uses server default.

anomaliesOnly.description: Whether to return only rows flagged as anomalies in alerts.

baselineLimit.description: Maximum baseline rows to return (1-500). Zero uses server default.

domain.description: Optional domain filter. Empty defaults to run domain.

historyLimit.description: Number of runs to inspect for trend series (1-120). Zero uses server default.

runId.description: Optional run id. Empty means latest run for domain.

GetForensicsTraceRequest.description: GetForensicsTraceRequest retrieves phase-level execution trace for a run.

GetForensicsTraceResponse.description: GetForensicsTraceResponse returns run metadata and phase trace.

GetPizzintStatusRequest.description: GetPizzintStatusRequest specifies parameters for retrieving PizzINT and GDELT data.

includeGdelt.description: Whether to include GDELT tension pairs in the response.

GetPizzintStatusResponse.description: GetPizzintStatusResponse contains Pentagon Pizza Index and GDELT tension data.

GetRiskScoresRequest.description: GetRiskScoresRequest specifies parameters for retrieving risk scores.

region.description: Optional region filter. Empty returns all tracked regions.

GetRiskScoresResponse.description: GetRiskScoresResponse contains composite risk scores and strategic assessments.

ListCalibratedAnomaliesRequest.description: ListCalibratedAnomaliesRequest retrieves calibrated anomalies for a run/domain.

anomaliesOnly.description: If true, return only entries flagged as anomalies.

limit.description: Maximum results to return (1-500). Zero uses server default.

maxPValue.description: Optional maximum p-value filter (0-1). Zero disables this filter.

minAbsLegacyZScore.description: Optional minimum absolute legacy z-score filter.

runId.description: Optional run id. Empty means latest run for domain.

limit.description: Maximum results to return (1-500). Zero uses server default.

offset.description: Optional pagination offset for run history listing.

ListFusedSignalsRequest.description: ListFusedSignalsRequest retrieves fused signal outputs for a run/domain.

limit.description: Maximum results to return (1-500). Zero uses server default.

runId.description: Optional run id. Empty means latest run for domain.

PizzintLocation.description: PizzintLocation represents a single monitored pizza location near the Pentagon.

dataFreshness.description: DataFreshness represents how current the data is.

isClosedNow.description: Whether the location is currently closed.

percentageOfUsual.description: Percentage of usual activity. Zero if unavailable.

spikeMagnitude.description: Spike magnitude above baseline. Zero if no spike.

PizzintStatus.description: PizzintStatus represents the Pentagon Pizza Index status (proxy for late-night DC activity).

dataFreshness.description: DataFreshness represents how current the data is.

updatedAt.description: Last data update time, as Unix epoch milliseconds.. Warning: Values > 2^53 may lose precision in JavaScript

RunForensicsShadowRequest.description: RunForensicsShadowRequest triggers a deterministic shadow forensics run.

domain.description: Domain namespace for this run ("infrastructure", "maritime", etc.).

persist.description: Whether to persist this run and results in blackboard storage.

RunForensicsShadowResponse.description: RunForensicsShadowResponse returns full outputs from the shadow run.

error.description: Error message if the run failed.

SearchGdeltDocumentsRequest.description: SearchGdeltDocumentsRequest specifies filters for searching GDELT news articles.

maxRecords.description: Maximum number of articles to return (1-250).

SearchGdeltDocumentsResponse.description: SearchGdeltDocumentsResponse contains GDELT article search results.

error.description: Error message if the search failed.

StrategicRisk.description: StrategicRisk represents a strategic risk assessment for a country or region.

items.description: Risk factors contributing to the assessment.

level.description:
SeverityLevel represents a three-tier severity classification used across domains.
 Maps to existing TS unions: 'low' | 'medium' | 'high'.

trend.description:
TrendDirection represents the directional movement of a metric over time.
 Used in markets, GDELT tension scores, and risk assessments.

ValidationError.description: ValidationError is returned when request validation fails. It contains a list of field violations describing what went wrong.

post.description: ClassifyEvent classifies a real-world event using AI (Groq).
GetCountryIntelBrief generates an AI intelligence brief for a country (OpenRouter).
GetForensicsPolicy returns learned phase-order policy rows.
GetForensicsRun returns run metadata and aggregate output counts.
GetForensicsTopologySummary returns topology alerts, trends, and baselines.
GetForensicsTrace returns phase-level trace data for a run.
GetPizzintStatus retrieves Pentagon Pizza Index and GDELT tension pair data.
GetRiskScores retrieves composite instability and strategic risk assessments.
ListCalibratedAnomalies returns conformal anomaly outputs for a run/domain.
ListForensicsRuns returns recent run summaries for observability.
ListFusedSignals returns weak-supervision fusion outputs for a run/domain.
RunForensicsShadow executes deterministic shadow forensics orchestration.
SearchGdeltDocuments searches the GDELT 2.0 Doc API for news articles.
